duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect new accounts and manage existing ones.
Learn the features and benefits of products and deliver the message to prospective users.
Provide product demonstrations and basic technical support.
Visit job sites to support installations and build knowledge.
Manage select dealer and end user relationships.
Hold distributor demonstration events and manage activities through salesforce.com.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree (AAS), or Trade School Certification, or Bachelor’s Degree (BS) preferred.
